YIQColor
struct
YIQColor

Defines a color in the YIQ colorspace. See https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/YIQ for details.

Members
uint8 y

Y component

uint8 i

I component

uint8 q

Q component

Header

Imaging/Color/Color.h

FRGBColor
struct
FRGBColor

FRGBColor defines an RGB tuple defined in floating point.  Each color component is in the range of 0.0 to 1.0

Members
uint8 r

R component

uint8 g

G component

uint8 b

B component

Header

Imaging/Color/Color.h

FRGBAColor
struct
FRGBAColor

FRGBAColor defines an RGBA tuple defined in floating point.  Each color component is in the range of 0.0 to 1.0

Members
uint8 r

Red component

uint8 g

Green component

uint8 b

Blue component

uint8 a

Alpha component

Header

Imaging/Color/Color.h

RGBColor
struct
RGBColor

Defines a color in the RGB colorspace. See https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/RGB_color_model for details.  Each color component is in the range of 0 to 255

Members
uint8 r

R component

uint8 g

G component

uint8 b

B component

Header

Imaging/Color/Color.h

HLSColor
struct
HLSColor

Defines a color in the HLS colorspace. See https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/YIQ for details.  Each color component is in the range of 0 to 255

Members
uint8 r

R component

uint8 g

G component

uint8 b

B component
